MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:27pm. Engineers have arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:52PM on Sunday, 20 December 2020
